    • storageSwapHandler

      public void storageSwapHandler()
      method that handles the swap depot levels action. It invokes the cli method that prints the storage and get the numbers, then it invokes the storage method that swap the levels and notify the user with the outcome.

    • checkForDepotChoice

      public static int checkForDepotChoice​(boolean[] emptyStatus)
      method that asks for the depot to place resources until a valid option is given
      Parameters:
      emptyStatus - boolean vector cotaining the info to which level are free
      Returns:
      an int with a valid option

    • addToStorage

      public static void addToStorage​(Storage storage, boolean[] emptyStatus, int index, int[] resources)
      method that handles the sorting of resources to a valid place
      Parameters:
      storage - pointer to storage to ease the interaction
      emptyStatus - status of the depots
      index - used as pointer to the right resource
      resources - vector containing the remaining resources

    • marbleMarketAction

      public void marbleMarketAction()
      method that starts the marbleMarket Action. asks the player for a choice between row and column then asks for the specific row or column then handles the leader interactions, the resource increase and the possible discarded resources by calling the specific methods.

    • playOrDiscardLeadersLogic

      public int playOrDiscardLeadersLogic​(int[] choice)
      logic for the play or discard a leader action. Given the choice as an int[],
      [0]: which leader;
      [1] discard or play
      the method returns an int stating which state has been reached
      "1" means that the leader has been discarded correctly
      "0" means that the leader has been played correcly
      "2" means that the player does not meet the conditions to play the leader (meaning that they can play them in the future)
      "3" means that the player has already played or discarded the leader, meaning that they can't play them again
      "-1" input error, abort action
      Parameters:
      choice - represents the decision made in the cli or gui methods:
      [0]: which leader;
      [1] discard or play
      Returns:
      int stating which state has been reached

    • playOrDiscardLeaders

      public void playOrDiscardLeaders()
      method that starts the play or discard a leader action.

    • buyACardAction

      public boolean buyACardAction()
      method that buys a card (or not)
      Returns:
      true if a card has been bought, false otherwise

    • productionActionCli

      public boolean productionActionCli​(GameStatusUpdate status, boolean[] actionable)
      production action for cli, the method does a loop where it asks the client for a production, checks if he can pay for it and then asks for a new production (or quit)
      Parameters:
      status - game status
      actionable - parameter generated by the player.class adding some controls for the production
      Returns:
      true if the action is completed, false otherwise

    • paymentAndGain

      public void paymentAndGain​(boolean[] selection, int[] realcost) throws NotEnoughResources
      method that pays a production then adds the "gains"
      Parameters:
      selection - selected productions
      realcost - total cost
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResources - cannot complete the payment

    • getPaidForProductions

      public int[] getPaidForProductions​(boolean[] selection)
      method for cli that give resources to the player after the productions
      Parameters:
      selection - all the activated productions
      Returns:
      vector with the gains in resources and faith points

    • activateProduction

      public boolean activateProduction()
      starter for the production action
      Returns:
      true if action is done, false if is aborted

    • addLeaderCostToProduction

      public void addLeaderCostToProduction​(int[] cost, int leader)
      method that adds the cost of a leader production to the costs
      Parameters:
      cost - cost (4 resources) at the moment
      leader - leader to add resources (1 or 2 expected)
